bibl.title: Origen's Corrections and the Text of P. Bodmer XXIV.
bibl.note: Origen was not dependent on the text of P. Bodmer XXIV (= van Haelst 118) in any significant way. Moreover, it is doubtful that any palaeographical analysis is able to pinpoint whether this text pre- or post-dates Origen.
PIETERSMA Albert, Origen's Corrections and the Text of P. Bodmer XXIV.
Journal of Northwest Semitic Languages 19 (1993) pp. 133-142.
